DataElement.preferredName: Patient EGFR Activating Mutation Activating ALK Gene Mutation Activating ROS1 Gene Mutation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator related to whether the patient has EGFR activating mutations, activating ALK gene mutations, or activating ROS1 gene mutations as criteria required to be eligible to participate in a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient EGFR Activating Mutation Activating ALK Gene Mutation Activating ROS1 Gene Mutation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A somatic mutation of the epidermal growth factor receptor gene which encodes a constitutively active 170kDa transmembrane protein, a short transmembrane region, and an intracellular domain._A change in the nucleotide sequence of the ALK gene that that results in constitutive activation of both ALK tyrosine kinase receptor protein and its downstream signaling pathways._A change in the nucleotide sequence of the ROS1 gene that that results in constitutive activation of both proto-oncogene tyrosine-protein kinase ROS and its downstream signaling pathways._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: EGFR Activating Mutation Activating ALK Gene Mutation Activating ROS1 Gene Mutation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: A somatic mutation of the epidermal growth factor receptor gene which encodes a constitutively active 170kDa transmembrane protein, a short transmembrane region, and an intracellular domain.:A change in the nucleotide sequence of the ALK gene that that results in constitutive activation of both ALK tyrosine kinase receptor protein and its downstream signaling pathways.:A change in the nucleotide sequence of the ROS1 gene that that results in constitutive activation of both proto-oncogene tyrosine-protein kinase ROS and its downstream signaling pathways.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: A somatic mutation of the epidermal growth factor receptor gene which encodes a constitutively active 170kDa transmembrane protein, a short transmembrane region, and an intracellular domain.
A change in the nucleotide sequence of the ALK gene that that results in constitutive activation of both ALK tyrosine kinase receptor protein and its downstream signaling pathways.
A change in the nucleotide sequence of the ROS1 gene that that results in constitutive activation of both proto-oncogene tyrosine-protein kinase ROS and its downstream signaling pathways.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 12/10/2021: CM Released as part of draft content review

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Known actionable EGFR mutatio
ReferenceDocuments.description: Known actionable EGFR mutations (except exon 20 insertion), ALK or ROS1 mutations that can be treated with oral tyrosine inhibitors.
